subject: junit test class location - with or without source code.
msgSnippet: i m looking for arguments for and against keeping junit test classes outside if the projects main source tree.  maybe this could be a pole, but i m after the
messageBody:
i'm looking for arguments for and against keeping junit test classes
outside if the projects main source tree. maybe this could be a pole,
but i'm after the arguments more than what everyone actually is doing.

thanks.
